sources.title: Hollow Triumph (1948)
sources.description: Pursued by the big-time gambler he robbed, John Muller assumes a new identity—with unfortunate results. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/hollow-triumph-1948/

sources.title: Hollow Triumph – The Scar (remastered edition) (1948, noir, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: Hollow Triumph (working title The Man Who Murdered Himself , reissued in the United States as The Scar ) is a 1948 American film noir crime film directed by Steve Sekely starring Paul Henreid and Joan Bennett. It was released by Eagle-Lion Films, based on the 1946 novel of the same title written by Murray Forbes.

sources.title: Hollow Triumph – The Scar (restored, with intro and outro) (1948, film noir, imdb score: 6.7)
sources.description: Hollow Triumph (working title The Man Who Murdered Himself , reissued in the United States as The Scar ) is a 1948 American film noir crime film directed by Steve Sekely starring Paul Henreid , Joan Bennett and Leslie Brooks . It was released by Eagle-Lion Films , based on the 1946 novel of the same title written by Murray Forbes. The film's sets were designed by the art director Edward L. Ilou .

metadata.Plot: John Muller, medical school dropout and brilliant crook, plans a holdup which goes a little bit wrong, and finds vindictive gambler Rocky Stansyck after him. At the end of his tether, he stumbles onto a lucky chance to assume an impenetrable new identity as psychiatrist Victor Bartok. But irony piles on as Muller finds it's out of the frying pan, into the fire.
metadata.Actors: Paul Henreid, Joan Bennett, Eduard Franz
